description: The OR_LOG_VERIF table contains OR management system log verification information.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the log verification refers to

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the log verification in the surgical log.

columns.name: OR_VERIFY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of verification performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verify


Log Post


Log Complete


Log Addendum

columns.name: VERIFY_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The answer (HQA) record for the verification.

columns.name: ATTEST_FLT_ID
columns.description: Holds the flowsheet template (FLT) ID used for documenting flowsheet information for the current attestation.

columns.name: ATTEST_FLT_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: ATTEST_FLOWSHT_INST
columns.description: Holds the flowsheet instant at which the flowsheet documentation is stored for the current attestation.
